list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous, likely to cause pain, or a threat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is prey to irrational fears
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy là con mồi để sợ hãi phi lý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be afraid of (someone or something) as likely to be dangerous, painful, or threatening.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: farmers fear that they will lose business
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nông dân sợ rằng họ sẽ mất kinh doanh
